bitmusic.network.message

Class MessageAddComment

  • java.lang.Object
    • bitmusic.network.message.AbstractMessage
      • bitmusic.network.message.MessageAddComment
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public final class MessageAddComment
extends AbstractMessage
    Message used to send a comment on a specific song.
